actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of budget authority for acquisition, construction and improvements by the U.S. Coast Guard, Department of Transportation.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of the House of Representatives of the proposed deferral of budget authority for acquisition, construction, and improvements by the Coast Guard, including funding for the Puget Sound Vessel Traffic System and follow-on work related to the Medium Endurance Cutter replacement program as set forth in the special message transmitted by the President to the Congress on October 3, 1977.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of budget authority for acquisition, construction and improvements by the U.S. Coast Guard, Department of Transportation.
